title: 3 and Out - HOF Induction Takeaways, Josh Allen Extension, Inside Scout's Camp Grind, Hurry Up Headlines, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - HOF Induction Takeaways, Josh Allen Extension, Inside Scout's Camp Grind, Hurry Up Headlines, Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John gives his takeaways from an impressive Pro Football Hall of Fame inductions, the massive Josh Allen extension, and takes you inside the insane life of an NFL scout during training camp. He also runs through the top headlines from the week and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
